Set hourly, daily or monthly salary for a single or multiple people with a possibility to assign by position, department and location. People are able to clock in/out multiple times a day with geotags. Optional geofencing boundaries can be enabled and prevent clock-ins out of the designated locations. Attach photos or selfies and leave comments for your managers, so they know the status of each record. Clockster compares attendance records with the current schedule of every person to provide precise working hours and to show whether they are on time or late. For those people who have missing attendance records, the system will offer to send a request to add them automatically.
